publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-1132.2 Roseanna Cunningham: Chardon LL Maize-As an amendment to motion (S2M-1132) in the name of Nora Radcliffe, leave out from the first "this" to end and insert "Bayer took the UK government decision, supported by the Scottish Executive, to give agreement in principle to the commercialisation of Chardon LL as confirmation that the product was "both safe and effective"; believes that decisions on the commercialisation of GM crops should be based on issues of public health and environmental safety rather than being left to the vagaries of the market, and regrets the failure of the Scottish Executive to use its legal powers to take a firmer stand against the commercialisation of Chardon LL maize."

S2M-1132.2 Roseanna Cunningham: Chardon LL Maize-As an amendment to motion (S2M-1132) in the name of Nora Radcliffe, leave out from the first "this" to end and insert "Bayer took the UK government decision, supported by the Scottish Executive, to give agreement in principle to the commercialisation of Chardon LL as confirmation that the product was "both safe and effective"; believes that decisions on the commercialisation of GM crops should be based on issues of public health and environmental safety rather than being left to the vagaries of the market, and regrets the failure of the Scottish Executive to use its legal powers to take a firmer stand against the commercialisation of Chardon LL maize."
